Package r7.sabre.spaces

package r7.sabre.spaces
Tools for analyzing solution spaces.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    r7.sabre.spaces.distance
    Story distance metrics for comparing solutions.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Causality
    Functions for reasoning about causality between story events.
    CharacterGoal
    A character goal links a character to one of its goals.
    SalienceVector
    A salience vector describes a story in terms of five numeric arrays that represent the relative salience of different entities in the story: namely its characters, places, times, actions, and character goals.
    StoryAction
    A story action represents an action in the context of a specific story, and includes information obtained from the solution such as which goals explained the action and which actions enabled it.
    StoryPlan
    A story plan is a sequence of story actions.
    StorySpace
    A story space maintains a list of story plans for a given problem.
